title: My Site Title
criticalCSS: :root{--max-width:800px;--size:5;--fox-o-w:600;--fox-o-h:814;--fox-aspect:calc(var(--fox-o-w)/var(--fox-o-h));--unit:calc((var(--size) / var(--fox-o-h)) * 10px);--primary-color:rgb(219,47,47);--fore-color:rgb(64,64,64);--fore-color-dim:rgba(64,64,64,.2);--fox-shape:polygon(0 0,35.66% 26.289%,64.333% 26.289%,100% 0,100% 26.289%,0 100%);--fox-width:calc(var(--fox-o-w) * var(--unit));--fox-height:calc(var(--fox-o-h) * var(--unit));--aspect-ration:16/9;color:var(--fore-color);font-family:Georgia,'Times New Roman',Times,serif}*{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline;box-sizing:border-box}strong{font-weight:800}em{font-style:oblique}img{max-width:100%;height:auto}a{color:var(--primary-color);border-bottom:1px solid var(--primary-color);text-decoration:none}p{margin:2vh 0 2vh 0}html{font-family:Inter,system-ui,sans-serif;font-weight:400;font-size:1.2rem;text-size-adjust:100%}h1,h2,h3{margin-top:2vh}h1{font-size:2.2rem}h2{font-size:2rem}h3{font-size:1.8rem}body{display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:100vh;padding:0;margin:0;line-height:1.5;letter-spacing:.02rem;margin:0}header{border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);flex:1 1 0}footer{margin-top:1rem;border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);justify-self:flex-end;flex:1 1 0}footer .content,header .content{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:row}footer .content{align-items:center}footer .content .menu{display:flex;align-items:center}main{margin-top:2vh;flex:50 0 0}header .content,main .content,footer .content{position:relative;margin:auto auto;max-width:var(--max-width);padding:0 20px}.menu{font-size:1rem}.menu a{margin:0 5px}a.social{border:none}a.social svg{position:relative;top:5px;max-width:1.2rem;max-height:1.2rem;width:1.2rem;height:1.2rem}.logo{font-size:1.2rem;word-spacing:.1rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.logo a{color:var(--fore-color);text-decoration:none;border:none}.fox{position:relative;height:var(--fox-height);width:var(--fox-width);background-color:var(--primary-color);shape-outside:var(--fox-shape);clip-path:var(--fox-shape);transform:translate(calc(40 * var(--unit)),calc(220 * var(--unit)));z-index:2;display:inline-block}ul,ol{margin:2vh 0 2vh 0}ul{display:table;list-style:none;list-style-position:outside}ol{display:table;list-style-position:outside}ol li{margin-left:1.5rem;margin-bottom:.5rem}ul li{position:relative;padding-left:1.5rem;margin-bottom:.5rem}ul li::before{display:block;float:left;position:relative;margin-left:-1.3rem;top:.3rem;content:'';background-color:var(--fore-color-dim);width:calc(16px * var(--fox-aspect));height:16px;min-width:calc(16px * var(--fox-aspect));min-height:16px;max-width:calc(16px * var(--fox-aspect));max-height:16px;shape-outside:var(--fox-shape);clip-path:var(--fox-shape)}blockquote{padding-left:1rem;font-style:oblique;border-left:3px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2)}code{padding:1px;border-bottom:1px dashed rgba(0,0,0,.5);font-family:monospace}pre code{display:block;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.1);background:rgba(0,0,0,.1);font-family:monospace}table{border-collapse:collapse;width:100%}td,th{border:1px solid #999;padding:.5rem;text-align:left}thead{background-color:rgba(219,47,47,1);color:#fff}tbody tr:nth-child(even){background:rgba(219,47,47,.05)}picture+cite{font-size:.8rem;font-style:oblique;text-align:center;margin:0;padding:0;display:block;color:var(--fore-color)}picture+cite a{color:var(--fore-color);border-color:var(--fore-color)}@media (max-width:320px){:root{--size:3}.logo{font-size:1rem}.menu{font-size:.8rem}}@media (max-width:550px){header .content{flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.menu{margin-bottom:1rem}}code[class*="language-"],pre[class*="language-"]{color:#f8f8f2;background:none;text-shadow:0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.3);font-family:Consolas,Monaco,'Andale Mono','Ubuntu Mono',monospace;font-size:.9em;text-align:left;white-space:pre;word-spacing:normal;word-break:normal;word-wrap:normal;line-height:1.5;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;-webkit-hyphens:none;-moz-hyphens:none;-ms-hyphens:none;hyphens:none}pre[class*="language-"]{padding:1em;margin:.5em 0;overflow:auto;border-radius:.3em}pre[class*="language-"]{background:#272822}.token.comment{color:slategray}.token.punctuation{color:#f8f8f2}.token.function{color:#e6db74}
